mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(freeboard_no, freeboard_writer, freeboard_title, freeboard_content, freeboard_writedate) values(#{freeboardNo}, #{freeboardWriter}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardContent}, sysdate);
mapper.select: select freeboard_no, freeboard_writer, freeboard_title, freeboard_content, freeboard_read, freeboard_like, freeboard_writedate from freeboard order by freeboard_writedate
